body:
As most of you know, yeah its Jake on yet another account. But I got my retired rank on this account, (plus it isn't as easy to just switch accounts anymore) so yeah. But I just want to apologize for a few things.

When I was promoted to Administrator, from that very moment on up until the day I retired, I had been planning ideas with Jozz, Tel, and the EC. However, all of my plans were meant to be for when the Nise Update was released. I know I already made this known a few times, but I'd rather make it official. Because of the fact that I hadn't released or hosted any Community Events from that point up until my retirement, I'm sorry. I'm sorry if it caused boredom throughout the Community, or it just reflected badly on me. 

I just figured I'd apologize, and now seemed appropriate to do so. Thanks, guys.

Regards, -Jake
body_tagged:
As most of you know, yeah its Jake on yet another account. But I got my retired rank on this account, (plus it isn't as easy to just switch accounts anymore) so yeah. But I just want to apologize for a few things.

When I was promoted to Administrator, from that very moment on up until the day I retired, I had been planning ideas with Jozz, Tel, and the EC. However, all of my plans were meant to be for when the Nise Update was released. I know I already made this known a few times, but I'd rather make it official. Because of the fact that I hadn't released or hosted any Community Events from that point up until my retirement, I'm sorry. I'm sorry if it caused boredom throughout the Community, or it just reflected badly on me. 

I just figured I'd apologize, and now seemed appropriate to do so. Thanks, guys.

Regards, -Jake
title: An apology, to the Community.

replies.body: We loved you Jake, no matter what you did <3
replies.body_tagged: We loved you Jake, no matter what you did <3

replies.body: Don't beat yourself up 'bout it m8. 'Tis just a game. :)
replies.body_tagged: Don't beat yourself up 'bout it m8. 'Tis just a game. :)

replies.body: We have and always will appreciate everything you've done for Avicus. ;)

replies.body: Doesn't matter Jake. Stay who you are people like you as you are. ;)

replies.body: Jake... you were the best.  No question.  You will always be loved on this server.  Whether you have a Staff rank or not, you will always be the best.  <3
